title: Laggy Gameplay
body:
over the past 5-6 games that i played i noticed something wierd 

every time i throw a skill shot or do something it feels kinda delayed and everything happens a second after on my screen 

Exmp. Lets say i throw Q with Ekko i see the sphere going but on the way back i don't see the sphere coming back and just the dmg on the minions 

it feels like an 1 sec delay and its really annoying 

whats the problem with that 

i started experiencing this 2 days ago before that everything okay

replies.body: This input delay can be caused by a packet loss problem with your network reaching the game server.  Basically, your connection isn't holding steady so it's causing your game to stutter.  When you have some time, run a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on.  The results will also provide a list of steps to help get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions or issues, I'll be around!
